nodes.text: The Red Meteor Consortium was a pirate organization during the time of the Galactic War. Following the Battle of Ilum, former Intelligence Minister of the Sith Empire hired the Red Meteor Consortium pirates to raid a Republic transport and capture the carbonite-frozen Shara Jenn. During the Revanite crisis, the former Cipher Nine and former Minister of Intelligence went to Rishi to negociate the liberation of Shara Jenn with Trademaster Kavork. After Cipher Nine killed the Trandoshan pirate Boruush, Kavork accepted to release Shara Jenn.
